physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Dysarthria, blurring of left eye, tingling in right upper extremity.
Patient was intubated and received mechanical ventilation.

physical_examinations.date: 5 months after transfer to the rehabilitation facility
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No subsequent isolation of the panresistant E. coli strain.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement noted with the clearance of bacteremia.
